verses.verse: <S%H3588>When<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H7355>have<s%> <S%H7355>compassion<s%> on <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> and <S%H5750>again<s%> <S%H977>choose<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H5117>settle<s%> them in their own <S%H127>land,<s%> then <S%H1616>strangers<s%> will <S%H3867>join<s%> them and <S%H5596>attach<s%> themselves to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%>

And the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> will <S%H3947>take<s%> them along and <S%H935>bring<s%> them to their <S%H4725>place,<s%> and the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> will <S%H5157>possess<s%> them as an <S%H5157>inheritance<s%> in the <S%H127>land<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> as <S%H5650>male<s%> <S%H5650>servants<s%> and <S%H8198>female<s%> <S%H5650>servants<s%><S%H8198>;<s%> and they will <S%H1961>take<s%> their <S%H7617>captors<s%> <S%H7617>captive,<s%> and will <S%H7287>rule<s%> over their <S%H5065>oppressors.<s%>

And it will be in the <S%H3117>day<s%> when the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5117>gives<s%> you <S%H5117>rest<s%> from your <S%H6090>pain<s%> and <S%H7267>turmoil<s%> and <S%H7186>harsh<s%> <S%H5656>service<s%> in <S%H834>which<s%> you have been <S%H5647>enslaved,<s%>

that you will <S%H5375>take<s%> up <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4912>taunt<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H349>"How<s%> the <S%H5065>oppressor<s%> has <S%H7673>ceased,<s%> [And how] <S%H9293>fury<s%> has <S%H7673>ceased!<s%>
"The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H7665>broken<s%> the <S%H4294>staff<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> The <S%H7626>scepter<s%> of <S%H4910>rulers<s%>

Which used to <S%H5221>strike<s%> the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> in <S%H5678>fury<s%> with <S%H1115>unceasing<s%> <S%H5627><s%> <S%H4347>strokes,<s%> Which <S%H7287>subdued<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> in <S%H639>anger<s%> with <S%H2820>unrestrained<s%> <S%H1097><s%> <S%H4783>persecution.<s%>
"The <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H776>earth<s%> is at <S%H5117>rest<s%> [and] is <S%H8252>quiet;<s%> They <S%H6476>break<s%> <S%H6476>forth<s%> into <S%H7440>shouts<s%> of <S%H7440>joy.<s%>

<S%H1571>"Even<s%> the <S%H1265>cypress<s%> <S%H1265>trees<s%> <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> over you, [and] the <S%H730>cedars<s%> of <S%H3844>Lebanon,<s%> [saying,] <S%H9241>'Since<s%> you were <S%H7901>laid<s%> <S%H7901>low,<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> [tree] <S%H3772>cutter<s%> <S%H5927>comes<s%> up <S%H5921>against<s%> us.'

<S%H7585>"Sheol<s%> from <S%H4480>beneath<s%> <S%H8478><s%> is <S%H7264>excited<s%> over you to <S%H7122>meet<s%> you when you <S%H935>come;<s%> It <S%H5782>arouses<s%> for you the <S%H7496>spirits<s%> of the <S%H7496>dead,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6260>leaders<s%> of the <S%H776>earth;<s%> It <S%H6965>raises<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%> from their <S%H3678>thrones.<s%>

"They will <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H6030>respond<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> to you, <S%H1571>'Even<s%> you have been <S%H2470>made<s%> <S%H2470>weak<s%> as we, You have <S%H4911>become<s%> <S%H4911>like<s%> us.

'Your <S%H1347>pomp<s%> [and] the <S%H1998>music<s%> of your <S%H5035>harps<s%> Have been <S%H3381>brought<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H7585>Sheol;<s%> <S%H7415>Maggots<s%> are <S%H3331>spread<s%> out [as your bed] <S%H8478>beneath<s%> you, And <S%H9641>worms<s%> are your <S%H4374>covering.<s%>'

<S%H349>"How<s%> you have <S%H5307>fallen<s%> from <S%H4605>heaven,<s%> O <S%H1966>star<s%> of the <S%H1966>morning,<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> of the <S%H7837>dawn!<s%> You have been <S%H1438>cut<s%> <S%H1438>down<s%> to the <S%H776>earth,<s%> You who have <S%H2522>weakened<s%> the <S%H1471>nations!<s%>

"But you <S%H559>said<s%> in your <S%H3824>heart,<s%> 'I will <S%H5927>ascend<s%> to <S%H4605>heaven;<s%> I will <S%H7311>raise<s%> my <S%H3678>throne<s%> <S%H4605>above<s%> the <S%H3556>stars<s%> of <S%H410>God,<s%> And I will <S%H3427>sit<s%> on the <S%H2022>mount<s%> of <S%H4150>assembly<s%> In the <S%H3411>recesses<s%> of the <S%H6828>north.<s%>
'I will <S%H5927>ascend<s%> <S%H5921>above<s%> the <S%H1116>heights<s%> of the <S%H5645>clouds;<s%> I will <S%H1819>make<s%> myself <S%H1819>like<s%> the <S%H9411>Most<s%> <S%H9411>High.<s%>'
<S%H389>"Nevertheless<s%> you will be <S%H3381>thrust<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H7585>Sheol,<s%> To the <S%H3411>recesses<s%> of the <S%H953>pit.<s%>

"Those who <S%H7200>see<s%> you will <S%H7688>gaze<s%> at you, They will <S%H995>ponder<s%> <S%H413>over<s%> you, [saying,] 'Is <S%H2088>this<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> who made the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H7264>tremble,<s%> Who <S%H7493>shook<s%> <S%H4467>kingdoms,<s%>

Who <S%H7760>made<s%> the <S%H8398>world<s%> like a <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> And <S%H2040>overthrew<s%> its <S%H5892>cities,<s%> Who did not <S%H6605>allow<s%> his <S%H615>prisoners<s%> to [go] <S%H1004>home<s%>?'
<S%H3605>"All<s%> the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H7901>lie<s%> in <S%H9202>glory,<s%> <S%H376>Each<s%> in his own <S%H1004>tomb.<s%>

"But you have been <S%H7993>cast<s%> out of your <S%H6913>tomb<s%> Like a <S%H8581>rejected<s%> <S%H5342>branch,<s%> <S%H3830>Clothed<s%> with the <S%H2026>slain<s%> who are <S%H2944>pierced<s%> with a <S%H2719>sword,<s%> Who <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H68>stones<s%> of the <S%H953>pit,<s%> Like a <S%H947>trampled<s%> <S%H6297>corpse.<s%>

"You will not be <S%H3161>united<s%> with them in <S%H6900>burial,<s%> <S%H3588>Because<s%> you have <S%H7843>ruined<s%> your <S%H776>country,<s%> You have <S%H2026>slain<s%> your <S%H5971>people.<s%> May the <S%H2233>offspring<s%> of <S%H7489>evildoers<s%> not be <S%H7121>mentioned<s%> <S%H5769>forever.<s%>

<S%H3559>"Prepare<s%> for his <S%H1121>sons<s%> a <S%H4293>place<s%> of <S%H4293>slaughter<s%> Because of the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of their fathers. They must not <S%H1>arise<s%> and <S%H6965>take<s%> <S%H3423>possession<s%> of the <S%H3423>earth<s%> And <S%H776>fill<s%> the <S%H4390>face<s%> of the <S%H6440>world<s%> with <S%H8398>cities.<s%>"

"And I will <S%H6965>rise<s%> up <S%H5921>against<s%> them," <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> "and will <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>off<s%> from <S%H894>Babylon<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%> and <S%H7605>survivors,<s%> <S%H5209>offspring<s%> and <S%H5220>posterity,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

"I will also <S%H7760>make<s%> it a <S%H4180>possession<s%> for the <S%H7090>hedgehog,<s%> and <S%H98>swamps<s%> of <S%H4325>water,<s%> and I will <S%H2894>sweep<s%> it with the <S%H4292>broom<s%> of <S%H8045>destruction,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts.<s%>

The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> has <S%H7650>sworn<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H518>"Surely,<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H9201>just<s%> as I have <S%H1819>intended<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> it has <S%H1961>happened,<s%> and <S%H9201>just<s%> as I have <S%H3289>planned<s%> so it will <S%H6965>stand,<s%>

to <S%H7665>break<s%> <S%H804>Assyria<s%> in My <S%H776>land,<s%> and I will <S%H947>trample<s%> him on My <S%H2022>mountains.<s%> Then his <S%H5923>yoke<s%> will be <S%H5493>removed<s%> from them, and his <S%H5448>burden<s%> <S%H5493>removed<s%> from their <S%H7926>shoulder.<s%>

<S%H384>"This<s%> is the <S%H6098>plan<s%> <S%H3289>devised<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H776>earth;<s%> and <S%H384>this<s%> is the <S%H3027>hand<s%> that is <S%H5186>stretched<s%> out <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>nations.<s%>

"For the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> has <S%H3289>planned,<s%> and <S%H4310>who<s%> can <S%H6565>frustrate<s%> [it]? And as for His stretched-out <S%H3027>hand,<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> can <S%H7725>turn<s%> it <S%H7725>back<s%>?"
In the <S%H8141>year<s%> that <S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H271>Ahaz<s%> <S%H4194>died<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H9294>oracle<s%> came: <S%H1961><s%>

"Do not <S%H8055>rejoice,<s%> O <S%H6429>Philistia,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> of you, <S%H3588>Because<s%> the <S%H7626>rod<s%> that <S%H5221>struck<s%> you is <S%H7665>broken;<s%> For from the <S%H8314>serpent<s%>'s <S%H8328>root<s%> a <S%H6848>viper<s%> will <S%H3318>come<s%> out, And its <S%H6529>fruit<s%> will be a <S%H5774>flying<s%> serpent.

"And those who are <S%H1060>most<s%> <S%H1800>helpless<s%> will <S%H7462>eat,<s%> And the <S%H34>needy<s%> will <S%H7257>lie<s%> <S%H7257>down<s%> in <S%H983>security;<s%> I will <S%H4191>destroy<s%> your <S%H8328>root<s%> with <S%H7458>famine,<s%> And it will <S%H2026>kill<s%> off your <S%H7611>survivors.<s%>

<S%H3213>"Wail,<s%> O <S%H8179>gate;<s%> <S%H2199>cry,<s%> O <S%H5892>city;<s%> <S%H4127>Melt<s%> away, O <S%H6429>Philistia,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> of you; For <S%H6227>smoke<s%> <S%H935>comes<s%> from the <S%H6828>north,<s%> And <S%H369>there<s%> is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H909>straggler<s%> in his <S%H4151>ranks.<s%>

<S%H4100>"How<s%> then will one <S%H6030>answer<s%> the <S%H4397>messengers<s%> of the <S%H1471>nation<s%>? That the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H3245>founded<s%> <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> And the <S%H6041>afflicted<s%> of His <S%H5971>people<s%> will <S%H2620>seek<s%> <S%H2620>refuge<s%> in it."
